( Carnage: Sorry about being late with my posting, I have been at my grandmother's all day. She is sick and I was left to care for her for a period of time. And  as a warning, as she is ill I might be late with quite a few posts so please be patient. Thank you.)

* Carnage watched Teltoli put the disc away in her wrist compartment, the Fuzor commenting that she didn't want her to get hurt and laughing a little at the comment. Carnage didn't laugh, she had seen quite a few of her targets do that just before they knew that they were going to die and that never got them anywhere, did it?
She looked at Teltoli seriously and then towards the lake, she watched as a slight wind came up and began to form ripples on the surface. She heard Teltoli's question about is she had killed Megatron yet, that comment seemed to bring the pain of her dead friend right to the surface again! Her spark ached and her shoulders slumped, this day never did start out right for her had it?!*

" I wish!"
